[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'bum nga pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@#/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam bzhi pa/_bam po dang po/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[1b.2\]]bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[1b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[1b.4\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[1b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[2a.2\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar 
[\[2a.3\]]gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[2a.4\]]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[2a.5\]]gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa dang /_dran pa nye par gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[2a.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gzhag pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi 
[\[2b.2\]]ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[2b.3\]]stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa 
[\[2b.4\]]dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[2b.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub 
[\[2b.6\]]sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba ngo bo 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[3a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[3a.3\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[3a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba dben 
[\[3a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[3a.6\]]na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag par spong ba dben pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi 
[\[3a.7\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]par spong ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin 
[\[3b.2\]]no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_yang dag par spong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[3b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[3b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi 
[\[3b.5\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[4a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[4a.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[4a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin 
[\[4a.5\]]pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang 
[\[4a.6\]]yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis du gnyis su byang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[4a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[4b.2\]]dbang po dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'

[\[4b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dbang po stong pa nyid dang /_dbang po dben pa dang /_dbang po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[4b.5\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_dbang po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_dbang po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[4b.6\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na dbang po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_dbang po stong pa nyid gang 
[\[4b.7\]]yin pa dang /_dbang po dben pa gang yin pa dang /_dbang po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/_stobs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon 
[\[5a.2\]]gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[5a.3\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_stobs dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[5a.4\]]stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[5a.5\]]dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe 
[\[5a.6\]]dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_stobs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_stobs stong pa nyid dang /_stobs dben pa dang /_stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stobs 
[\[5a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na stobs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_stobs dben pa 
[\[5b.2\]]gang yin pa dang /_stobs ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de 
[\[5b.3\]]gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon 
[\[5b.4\]]gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[5b.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i 
[\[5b.6\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[5b.7\]]dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[6a.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]ba la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[6a.3\]]lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[6a.4\]]phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan 
[\[6a.5\]]lag dben pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang 
[\[6a.6\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong

[\[6b\]]

[\[7a\]]

[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]ltar na gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[10a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe 
[\[10a.3\]]dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[10a.4\]]dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[10a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[10a.6\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[10a.7\]]dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa dben pa dang /_rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[10b.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par thar pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid 
[\[10b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[10b.4\]]de ltar na/_rnam par thar pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[10b.5\]]sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mthar 
[\[10b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi 
[\[10b.7\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis 
[\[11a.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[11a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[11a.4\]]sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben 
[\[11a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang 
[\[11a.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang /_
[\[11a.7\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid 
[\[11b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[11b.3\]]de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa 
[\[11b.4\]]gang yin pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin 
[\[11b.5\]]pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[11b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam 
[\[11b.7\]]par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i

[\[12a.5\]]dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[12a.6\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[12b.2\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[12b.3\]]ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[12b.4\]]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[12b.5\]]sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[12b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa 
[\[12b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13a.2\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[13a.3\]]so/_/mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa 
[\[13a.4\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[13a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su 
[\[13a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i 
[\[13a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang /_mngon par shes pa dben pa dang /_mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_mngon par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_mngon par shes pa ngo 
[\[13b.2\]]bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[13b.3\]]bu/_de ltar na mngon par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang 
[\[13b.4\]]chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[13b.5\]]bu/_ting nge 'dzin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/_
[\[13b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[13b.7\]]phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid 
[\[14a.2\]]kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[14a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ting nge 'dzin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang /_ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_

[\[14a.5\]]ba yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_

[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi

[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_

[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang

[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_snying rje chen po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'

[\[17b.4\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[17b.7\]]snying rje chen po dben pa dang /_snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_snying rje chen po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]snying rje chen po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang 
[\[18a.2\]]gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na snying rje chen po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[18a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sangs rgyas 
[\[18a.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[18a.5\]]pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[18a.6\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_
[\[18a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[18b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[18b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[18b.4\]]gzhan ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang 
[\[18b.5\]]gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 
[\[18b.6\]]'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa 
[\[18b.7\]]dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]so/_/chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[19a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[19a.3\]]chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[19a.4\]]dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[19a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi 
[\[19a.6\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma 
[\[19a.7\]]yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na chos kyi dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus 
[\[19b.2\]]gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub 
[\[19b.3\]]sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin 
[\[19b.4\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[19b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub 
[\[19b.6\]]sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[19b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid dben pa dang /_de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]de bzhin nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_/
[\[20a.2\]]sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[20a.3\]]nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de 
[\[20a.4\]]gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar 
[\[20a.5\]]mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[20a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[20a.7\]]dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[20b.2\]]dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon 
[\[20b.3\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[20b.4\]]yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[20b.5\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa 
[\[20b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[20b.7\]]bu/_gzhan yang bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[21a.2\]]sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar 
[\[21a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[21a.4\]]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gyis mi 
[\[21a.5\]]khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang 
[\[21a.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la 
[\[21a.7\]]sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma 
[\[21b.2\]]yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i 
[\[21b.3\]]dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang 
[\[21b.4\]]yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[21b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar 
[\[21b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos dben pa'i 
[\[21b.7\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[22a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_nyan thos stong pa nyid dang /_nyan thos dben pa dang /_nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[22a.3\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[22a.4\]]yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na nyan thos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[22a.5\]]gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang 
[\[22a.6\]]rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[22a.7\]]dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[22b.2\]]phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i 
[\[22b.3\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[22b.4\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang 
[\[22b.5\]]gzhan ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi 
[\[22b.6\]]mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na rang sangs rgyas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_
[\[22b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa 
[\[23a.2\]]nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi 
[\[23a.3\]]mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems 
[\[23a.4\]]dpa' dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[23a.5\]]sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub 
[\[23a.6\]]sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[23a.7\]]dpa' dben pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_
[\[23b.2\]]dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' med pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_
[\[23b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[23b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon 
[\[23b.5\]]gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad 
[\[23b.6\]]mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[23b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dpa' dbus su mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[24a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_thams cad mkhyen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[24a.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_thams cad mkhyen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid 
[\[24a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/_sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/_dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na thams 
[\[24a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[24a.6\]]yin pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /_dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na byang chub sems 
[\[24a.7\]]dpa' sngon gyi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]brgya pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[24b.2\]]par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni/_sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[24b.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzugs 
[\[24b.4\]]kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[24b.5\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes 
[\[24b.6\]]zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[24b.7\]]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[25a.2\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[25a.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' 
[\[25a.4\]]yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[25a.5\]]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 
[\[25a.6\]]'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i 
[\[25a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe 
[\[25b.2\]]dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_rnam par shes pa kun tu 
[\[25b.3\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[25b.4\]]dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[25b.5\]]de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[25b.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[25b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'/_kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[26a.2\]]dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[26a.3\]]rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26a.4\]]kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[26a.5\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rna ba'i 
[\[26a.6\]]sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rna ba kun 
[\[26a.7\]]tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du/_ci'i phyir na/_sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[26b.2\]]phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sna'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[26b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun 
[\[26b.4\]]tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[26b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lce'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[26b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i 
[\[26b.7\]]phyir na/_lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lus 
[\[27a.2\]]kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[27a.3\]]sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yid ni nam 
[\[27a.4\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[27a.5\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des 
[\[27a.6\]]na/_yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_
[\[27a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[27b.2\]]ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig 
[\[27b.3\]]par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sgra ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[27b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[27b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[27b.6\]]mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dri ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[27b.7\]]mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dri'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[28a.2\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ro ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[28a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_ro'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa 
[\[28a.4\]]nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[28a.5\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_reg ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[28a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_reg gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[28a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]phyir na/_chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[28b.2\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chos kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[28b.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[28b.4\]]bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam 
[\[28b.5\]]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
