[\[28b.6\]]de bzhin du [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[28b.7\]]rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[29a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[29a.3\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[29a.4\]]yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna'i rnam par shes 
[\[29a.5\]]pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du 
[\[29a.6\]]brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[29a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sna'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lce'i rnam par 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce'i rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon 
[\[29b.2\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lce'i 
[\[29b.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lce'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[29b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus 
[\[29b.5\]]kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod 
[\[29b.6\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[29b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer pa ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[30a.2\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi 
[\[30a.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[30a.4\]]kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni nam 
[\[30a.5\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[30a.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[30a.7\]]ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[30b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[30b.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du 
[\[30b.4\]]ci'i phyir na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper 
[\[30b.5\]]na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[30b.6\]]phyir/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[30b.7\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du 
[\[31a.2\]]brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[31a.3\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[31a.4\]]chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[31a.5\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[31a.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[31a.7\]]par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni nam mkha' dang 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[31b.2\]]de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_
[\[31b.3\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun 
[\[31b.4\]]tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[31b.5\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[31b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[31b.7\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba'i 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[32a.2\]]nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[32a.3\]]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 
[\[32a.4\]]'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' 
[\[32a.5\]]dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[32a.6\]]ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[32a.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi 
[\[32b.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[32b.3\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[32b.4\]]kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya 
[\[32b.5\]]zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[32b.6\]]mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[32b.7\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[33a.2\]]dwa ti'i bu/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[33a.3\]]pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[33a.4\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[33a.5\]]bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[33a.6\]]'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sa'i khams 
[\[33a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sa'i khams kun tu mtha' 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[33b.2\]]chu'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/
[\[33b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[33b.4\]]rnam grangs des na/_chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya 
[\[33b.5\]]zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' 
[\[33b.6\]]yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus 
[\[33b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rlung gi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rlung gi khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[34a.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rlung gi khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[34a.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rlung gi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[34a.4\]]bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_nam mkha'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i 
[\[34a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du nam mkha'i 
[\[34a.6\]]khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_nam mkha'i khams kun tu 
[\[34a.7\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par shes pa'i khams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[34b.2\]]nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[34b.3\]]mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_ma rig pa 
[\[34b.4\]]kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[34b.5\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[34b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_ma rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 
[\[34b.7\]]'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'du byed kyi sngon 
[\[35a.2\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[35a.3\]]mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' 
[\[35a.4\]]dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[35a.5\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[35a.6\]]rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[35a.7\]]par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[35b.2\]]stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_skye mched 
[\[35b.3\]]drug kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_skye mched drug ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[35b.4\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[35b.5\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_skye mched drug kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[35b.6\]]yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_reg pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_reg pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i 
[\[35b.7\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du reg 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_reg pa kun tu mtha' 
[\[36a.2\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[36a.3\]]ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' 
[\[36a.4\]]zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[36a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sred pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[36a.6\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sred pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[36a.7\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sred pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sred pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di 
[\[36b.2\]]skad du ci'i phyir na/_len pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_len pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper 
[\[36b.3\]]na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du len pa stong pa 
[\[36b.4\]]nyid kyi phyir/_len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_len pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[36b.5\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_srid pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[36b.6\]]srid pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/
[\[36b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]grangs des na/_srid pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_skye ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer 
[\[37a.2\]]ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_skye ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[37a.3\]]phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[37a.4\]]dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_skye ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rga shi kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas bar rig par bya zhes 
[\[37a.5\]]zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rga shi ni nam mkha' dag mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' 
[\[37a.6\]]zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam 
[\[37a.7\]]grangs des na/_rga shi kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' 
[\[37b.2\]]yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[37b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du 
[\[37b.4\]]ci'i phyir na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[37b.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin 
[\[37b.6\]]du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[37b.7\]]ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[38a.2\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[38a.3\]]phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[38a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[38a.5\]]dwa ti'i bu/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dag mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' 
[\[38a.6\]]zhes [{]myig [,]mig [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am 
[\[38a.7\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la 
[\[38b.2\]]ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_bsam 
[\[38b.3\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' 
[\[38b.4\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang 
[\[38b.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[38b.6\]]nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 
[\[38b.7\]]'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o//_//
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer 
[\[39a.2\]]ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam 
[\[39a.3\]]mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[39a.4\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[39a.5\]]yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_phyi stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' 
[\[39a.6\]]yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong 
[\[39a.7\]]pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_phyi stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_phyi nang stong pa 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[39b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[39b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[39b.4\]]par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang 
[\[39b.5\]]mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[39b.6\]]ti'i bu/_de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[39b.7\]]rnam grangs des na/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_chen po stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chen po stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[40a.2\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du chen po stong ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[40a.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chen po stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i 
[\[40a.4\]]phyir na/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_
[\[40a.5\]]nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[40a.6\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_don dam pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[40a.7\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam 
[\[40b.2\]]mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[40b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'dus byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' 
[\[40b.4\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[40b.5\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'dus ma byas 
[\[40b.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[40b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]dwa ti'i bu/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myed [,]med [}{]myig[,]mig[}]sa/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu 
[\[41a.2\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[41a.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[41a.4\]]gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang 
[\[41a.5\]]mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[41a.6\]]ti'i bu/_de bzhin du thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[41a.7\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[41b.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi 
[\[41b.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[41b.4\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nam 
[\[41b.5\]]mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang 
[\[41b.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[41b.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi 
[\[42a.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_chos thams 
[\[42a.3\]]cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[42a.4\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang 
[\[42a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas 
[\[42a.6\]]kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[42a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]phyir na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[42b.2\]]dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[42b.3\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[42b.4\]]stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes 
[\[42b.5\]]zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu 
[\[42b.6\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_
[\[42b.7\]]stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper 
[\[43a.2\]]na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[43a.3\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[43a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[43a.5\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' 
[\[43a.6\]]yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[43a.7\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam 
[\[43b.2\]]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de 
[\[43b.3\]]bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs 
[\[43b.4\]]des na/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_yang dag par spong ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[43b.5\]]yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yang dag par spong ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[43b.6\]]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus 
[\[43b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_yang dag par spong ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]skad du ci'i phyir na/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[44a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin 
[\[44a.3\]]du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_
[\[44a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_
[\[44a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dbang po rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[44a.6\]]nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_dbang po rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[44a.7\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[44b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[44b.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_
[\[44b.4\]]gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni nam mkha' 
[\[44b.5\]]dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/
[\[44b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[44b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun tu mtha' 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_
[\[45a.2\]]nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[45a.3\]]lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs 
[\[45a.4\]]des na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'phags pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[45a.5\]]dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[45a.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[45a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_'phags pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[45b.2\]]bu/_bsam gtan rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na/_nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' 
[\[45b.3\]]yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_bsam gtan rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[45b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 
[\[45b.5\]]'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i 
[\[45b.6\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[45b.7\]]bu/_de bzhin du tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]grangs des na/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[46a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam 
[\[46a.3\]]mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[46a.4\]]'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_/stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[46a.5\]]bu/_rnam grangs des na/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rnam par thar pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[46a.6\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon 
[\[46a.7\]]gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[46b\]]
