[\[46b.1\]]rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rnam par thar pa kun tu 
[\[46b.2\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[46b.3\]]yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[46b.4\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_
[\[46b.5\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs 
[\[46b.6\]]des na/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[46b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]pa med pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[47a.2\]]nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[47a.3\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[47a.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[47a.5\]]yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mngon par shes pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[47a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[47a.7\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[47b.2\]]'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 
[\[47b.3\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_ting nge 'dzin kun tu 
[\[47b.4\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang 
[\[47b.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas 
[\[47b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[47b.7\]]mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[48a.2\]]'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48a.3\]]pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs 
[\[48a.4\]]des na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' 
[\[48a.5\]]yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[48a.6\]]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[48a.7\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_
[\[48b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[48b.3\]]de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[48b.4\]]ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[48b.5\]]chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_snying rje chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[48b.6\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[48b.7\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/gang 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[49a.2\]]rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' zhes [{]mying [,]ming [}]du brjod do/_/
[\[49a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[49a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_
[\[49a.5\]]gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_'du byed byang chub sems 
[\[49a.6\]]dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[49a.7\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la tshor ba 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub 
[\[49b.2\]]sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'du byed [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[49b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[49b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 
[\[49b.5\]{]myig [,]mig [}{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rna ba [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub 
[\[49b.6\]]sems dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rna ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna ni snas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la sna [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[49b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_sna byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/lce ni lces stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la lce [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_lce byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus ni lus kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la lus [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[50a.2\]]bu rnam grangs des na/_lus byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid ni yid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la yid med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 
[\[50a.3\]]des na/_yid byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gzugs [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang 
[\[50a.4\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra ni sgras stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la sgra [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang 
[\[50a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sgra byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dri ni dris stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la dri [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam 
[\[50a.6\]]grangs des na/_dri byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ro ni ros stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la ro [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_ro byang chub 
[\[50a.7\]]sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg ni reg gis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la reg [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_reg byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos ni chos kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la chos [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta 
[\[50b.2\]]bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[50b.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 
[\[50b.4\]]rnam par shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam 
[\[50b.5\]]par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_sna'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu 
[\[50b.6\]]yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/_lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam 
[\[50b.7\]]grangs des na/_lce'i rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni/_lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/_
[\[51a.2\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[51a.3\]]zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems 
[\[51a.4\]]dpa' med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/_de ci'i

[\[55a.1\]]dpa' med do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

[\[55a.3\]]do/_/stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la stobs rnams med byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[55a.4\]]rnams [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[55a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/_
[\[55a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs 
[\[55a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rnam par thar ba brgyad med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[55b.2\]]zhe na/_stong pa nyid la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_
[\[55b.3\]]smon pa med pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/_
[\[55b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[55b.5\]]do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

[\[55b.7\]]med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/snying rje chen 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]po ni/_snying rje chen pos stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la snying rje chen po [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[56a.2\]]stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[56a.3\]]de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la de bzhin nyid med/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i 
[\[56a.4\]]mtha' [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings ni/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thams

[\[56a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/_byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub 
[\[56a.7\]]sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa med byang chub sems dpa' med do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/_

[\[56b.3\]]ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[56b.4\]]zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta 
[\[56b.5\]]bu yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang yang 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang 
[\[56b.6\]]zhig la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad du smras zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs ni gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs ni tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba ni tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[56b.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshor ba ni gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du shes ni 'du shes la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang tshor 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du 
[\[57a.2\]]byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[57a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni rna ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba ni rna la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rna ba ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba ni snal [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna ni sna la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sna ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[57a.4\]]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce ni lce la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus ni lus la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[57a.5\]]lus ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid ni yid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs 
[\[57a.6\]]ni gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs ni sgra la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra ni sgra la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sgra ni gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang sgra ni dri la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dri ni dri la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[57a.7\]]dri ni gzugs dang sgra la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni rol [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ro ni ro la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]reg ni reg la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos ni chos la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri

[\[57b.6\]]shes pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa

[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par

[\[58a.5\]]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni 
[\[58a.6\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_
[\[58a.7\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]lce'i 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg

[\[59a.1\]]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te

[\[59a.5\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la [{]myed [,]med [}]

[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]sa'i khams la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams ni chu'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dang chu'i khams ni me'i khams 
[\[59b.2\]]la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni/_me'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/me'i khams ni sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni/_rlung gi khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[59b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams ni 
[\[59b.4\]]nam mkha'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sa'i khams dang 
[\[59b.5\]]chu'i khams dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams

[\[59b.7\]]'du byed ni/_'du byed la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'du byed ni/_ma rig pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed ni/_rnam par shes pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa ni/_/rnam par shes pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni myid dang gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[60a.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[60a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye mched drug ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug ni reg pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[60a.4\]]reg pa ni reg pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/reg pa ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_

[\[60a.6\]]ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba ni sred pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sred pa ni sred pa la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sred pa ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam 
[\[60a.7\]]par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa ni lend 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lend pa ni lend pa la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lend pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang sred pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed 
[\[60b.2\]]dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang /_len pa ni srid pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/srid pa ni srid pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/srid pa ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]
[\[60b.3\]]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang /_srid pa dang len pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa ni skye ba 
[\[60b.4\]]la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye ba ni skye ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/skye ba ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang /_
[\[60b.5\]]rnam par shes pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang /_srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rga shi ni rga shi la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rga shi ni ma rig pa dang /_'du byed dang rnam

[\[60b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[61a.2\]]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[61a.3\]]tu phyin pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod 
[\[61a.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[61a.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[61a.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[61a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa 
[\[61b.2\]]nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang 
[\[61b.3\]]stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[61b.4\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen 
[\[61b.5\]]po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong 
[\[61b.6\]]pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong 
[\[62a.2\]]pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa 
[\[62a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong

[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[64b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[64b.4\]]nyid ni/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

[\[64b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[64b.7\]]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]rkang pa rnams la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni

[\[67b.7\]]brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /_
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[68a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[68a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang 
[\[68a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi dmigs so/_/
[\[68a.5\]]so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/byang chub 
[\[68a.6\]]sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /_rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_
[\[68a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/_/so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang /_bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/_so so'i skye bo'i sa dang /_
[\[68b.2\]]rigs kyi sa dang /_brgyad pa'i sa dang /_mthong ba'i sa dang bsrabs pa'i sa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad 
[\[68b.3\]]shes pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la 
[\[68b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams 
[\[68b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni 
[\[68b.6\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[68b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dgra 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bcom pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa ni rang sangs rgyas la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[69a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang sangs rgyas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_
[\[69a.3\]]dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_
[\[69a.4\]]dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[69a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[69a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab 
[\[69a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni/_gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar chos thams cad [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]bas/_byang chub sems dpa' [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[69b.2\]]cing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur 
[\[69b.3\]]du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_'du shes zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed ces bya ba dang /_
[\[69b.4\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/_glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs ma yin/_de ni tshor ba ma yin/_de ni 'du shes ma yin/_de ni 'du byed ma yin/_
[\[69b.5\]]de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/
[\[69b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ces bya ba dang /_rna ba zhes bya ba dang /_sna zhes bya ba dang /_lce zhes bya ba dang /_lus zhes bya ba dang /_yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro gang na 
[\[69b.7\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/_mig ma yin/_de ni rna ba ma yin/_de ni sna ma yin/_de ni lce ma yin/_de ni lus ma yin/_de ni yid ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_gzugs zhes bya ba dang /_sgra zhes bya ba dang /_dri zhes bya ba dang /_ro zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[70a.2\]]reg ces bya ba dang /_chos zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/_de ni sgra ma yin/_de ni dri ma yin/_de ni ro ma yin/_de ni reg ma 
[\[70a.3\]]yin/_de ni chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_mig gi 
[\[70a.4\]]rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/_
[\[70a.5\]]'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang mi gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/_de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/_de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/_de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/_
[\[70a.6\]]de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/_de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/_/
[\[70a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[70b.2\]]ma yin/_de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_
[\[70b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[70b.4\]]ba zhes bya ba dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang mi 
[\[70b.5\]]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_de ni lce'i 'dus 
[\[70b.6\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i 
[\[70b.7\]]phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_sa'i khams zhes bya ba dang /_chu'i khams zhes bya ba dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhes bya ba dang /_rlung gi khams zhes bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]shes bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma 
[\[71a.2\]]yin/_de ni chu'i khams ma yin/_de ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma yin/_de ni rlung gi khams ma yin/_de ni nam mkha'i khams ma min/_de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin 
[\[71a.3\]]pa de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang /_'du byed ces bya ba dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 
[\[71a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_skye mched drug ces bya ba dang /_reg pa zhes bya ba dang /_tshor ba zhes bya ba dang /_sred pa zhes bya ba dang /_len pa zhes bya ba dang /_srid pa zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba zhes bya ba dang /_rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni/_glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa 
[\[71a.5\]]ste/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni gang nas kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong gang du yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro gang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin/_de ni 'du byed ma yin/_de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/_de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma yin/_de ni skye mched drug ma 
[\[71a.6\]]yin/_de ni reg pa ma yin/_de ni tshor ba ma yin/_de ni sred pa ma yin/_de ni len pa ma yin/_de ni srid pa ma yin/_de ni skye ba ma yin/_de ni rga shi ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/stong pa gang yin pa de 
[\[71a.7\]]ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/_/'di 
[\[71b.2\]]lta ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de 
[\[71b.3\]]gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}]
[\[71b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/'di lta ste/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[71b.5\]]phyin pa 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang ming med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing

[\[72a\]]

[\[74a.1\]]de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang yang dag par spong ba rnams byed/_yang

[\[74b.1\]]la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_

[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa te/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[75a.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_
[\[75a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang rnam par thar pa rnams med/_rnam par thar pa rnams la yang ming [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]
[\[75a.4\]]gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni glo 
[\[75a.5\]]bur du ming du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang 
[\[75a.6\]]yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming 
[\[75a.7\]]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_mngon par shes pa rnams zhes 
[\[75b.2\]]bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_mngon par shes pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[75b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[75b.4\]]rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[75b.5\]]'di lta ste/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka
