[\[75b.7\]]pa'i stobs rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[76a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_so so yang dag 
[\[76a.3\]]par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams gang 
[\[76a.4\]]yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang byams pa chen po 
[\[76a.5\]{]myed[,]med[}]/_byams pa chen po la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_byams pa chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[76a.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang snying rje chen po [{]myed[,]med[}]/_snying rje chen po la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_snying rje chen po gang yin pa de gnyis ka 
[\[76a.7\]]yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang sangs 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]myed[,]med[}]/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_
[\[76b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang thams cad shes pa nyid [{]myed[,]med[}]/_thams cad shes pa nyid la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[76b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_lam 
[\[76b.4\]]gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myed[,]med[}]/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa 
[\[76b.5\]]de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]la yang rnam 
[\[76b.6\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang [{]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]gang yin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]te/_de'i phyir 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[76b.7\]]sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]tsam mo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gang yang 'di skad du dper na/_bdag bdag 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]ces bya ste/_bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na sems can sems can zhes bya ste/_sems can shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na srog srog ces bya ste/_srog shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na 'gro ba 
[\[77a.2\]]'gro ba zhes bya ste/_'gro ba shin tu mngon par ma grub po/_/dper na gso ba gso ba zhes bya ste/_gso ba shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na skyes bu skyes bu zhes bya ste/_skyes bu shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na gang zag gang zag ces bya ste/_gang 
[\[77a.3\]]zag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na shed can shed can zhes bya ste/_shed can shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na shed bdag shed bdag ces bya ste/_shed bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na byed pa po byed pa po zhes bya ste/_byed pa po 
[\[77a.4\]]shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na tshor ba po tshor ba po zhes bya ste/_tshor ba po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na shes pa po shes pa po zhes bya ste/_shes pa po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/_/dper na mthong ba po mthong ba po zhes bya ste/_mthong ba po shin tu 
[\[77a.5\]]mngon par ma grub po/_/zhes ci'i phyir de skad du smras zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sems can shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub 
[\[77a.6\]]par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_srog shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'gro ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_gso ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de 
[\[77a.7\]]mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_skyes bu shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_gang zag shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_shed can shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_shed bdag shin tu med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_byed pa po shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_

[\[77b.3\]]ba lta ga la yod/_gzugs shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'du shes shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par

[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_reg shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_chos shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam

[\[78a.5\]]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[78a.6\]]ba lta ga la yod/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las 
[\[78a.7\]]byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung 
[\[78b.2\]]ba'i tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sa'i khams shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 
[\[78b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_chu'i khams shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la

[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]la yod/_len pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_srid pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_skye ba shin tu med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_
[\[79a.2\]]de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rga shi shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_

[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba 
[\[79b.2\]]lta ga la yod/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rang bzhin stong pa

[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]shin tu med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

[\[80a.3\]]par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rnam par thar pa brgyad shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la

[\[80a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_byams pa chen po shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_snying rje chen po shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_nyan thos 
[\[80b.2\]]shin tu med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_rang sangs rgyas shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 
[\[80b.3\]]'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]na/_de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_bdag bdag ces kyang bya 
[\[80b.4\]]ste/_bdag shin tu mngon par grub pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang gang chos thams cad kyang de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin nam zhes zer ba de ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de de bzhin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[80b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_smras pa gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba la 'du ba las byung 
[\[80b.6\]]ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/'du shes la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[80b.7\]]rna ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_sgra la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dri la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ro la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chos la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[81a.2\]]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo 
[\[81a.3\]]nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung 
[\[81a.4\]]ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'du ba las 
[\[81a.5\]]byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung 
[\[81a.6\]]ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i 
[\[81a.7\]]ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/chu'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/me'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rlung gi khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nam mkha'i khams la 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rig pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[81b.2\]]do/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye mched drug la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sred pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[81b.3\]]do/_/len pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/_/srid pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye ba la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rga shi la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung 
[\[81b.4\]]ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bsam gtan gyi 
[\[81b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/nang stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi stong pa nyid la 'du ba las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid

[\[82a\]]

[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bral bas ma yin no/_/sna sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce sdug bsngal ba ste/_yang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid sdug bsngal ba ste/_

[\[85a.6\]]bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang

[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[85b.2\]]kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sa'i khams sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chu'i khams sdug bsngal ba 
[\[85b.3\]]ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/me'i khams sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[85b.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes 
[\[85b.5\]]pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin

[\[90a.3\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chu'i khams zhi 
[\[90a.4\]]ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/me'i khams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi ba ste/_
[\[90a.5\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 
[\[90a.6\]]zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sred pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas 
[\[90a.7\]]ma yin no/_/len pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/srid pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye ba zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rga shi zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[90b.2\]]zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang 
[\[90b.3\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang 
[\[90b.4\]]bral bas ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_
[\[90b.5\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[90b.6\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid zhi ba ste/_
[\[90b.7\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi ba 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dbang po rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang 
[\[91a.2\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stobs rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshad med pa rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91a.4\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91a.5\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral 
[\[91a.6\]]bas ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/so so yang 
[\[91a.7\]]dag par rig pa bzhi zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/snying rje chen po zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad zhi ba ste/_gang 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar zhi ba gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa dang zad pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad zhi ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de dag gang yin/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[91b.3\]]dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe rab stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du shes stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91b.4\]]rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91b.5\]]lce stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sgra 
[\[91b.6\]]stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dri stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ro stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chos stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[91b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_

[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]no/_/rnam par shes pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[93b.1\]]dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ste/_

[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]te reg pa mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_

[\[94b.3\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[99a.1\]]ma yin no/_/lus dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sgra dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[99a.2\]]dri dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ro dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chos dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_
[\[99a.3\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par 
[\[99a.4\]]shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[99a.5\]]pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[99a.6\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas 
[\[99a.7\]]ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chu'i khams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dge ba ste/_
[\[99b.2\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[99b.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin 
[\[99b.4\]]no/_/skye mched drug dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sred pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/len pa dge ba ste/_gang 
[\[99b.5\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/srid pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye ba dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rga shi dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_
[\[99b.6\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas 
[\[99b.7\]]ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi stong 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang 
[\[100a.2\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mtha' las 
[\[100a.3\]]'das pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[100a.4\]]dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang 
[\[100a.5\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[100a.6\]]yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dbang po 
[\[100a.7\]]rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stobs rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dge ba ste/_gang 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[100b.2\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[100b.3\]]yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang 
[\[100b.4\]]bral bas ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/so so yang dag par 
[\[100b.5\]]rig pa bzhi dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_snying rje chen po dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas 
[\[100b.6\]]ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar gang dge ba de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang zad pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni dge ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[100b.7\]]gzhan yang chos thams cad ni kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin ba de dag gang yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du shes kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[101a.2\]]yin no/_/rnam par shes pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_
[\[101a.3\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce kha na ma thob med pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[101a.4\]]gzugs kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sgra kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dri kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ro kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[101a.5\]]reg kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chos kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par 
[\[101a.6\]]shes pa kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa kha na ma thob [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa kha na 
[\[101a.7\]]ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]te reg pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa kha

[\[101b.7\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kha na ma 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[102a.2\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sred ba kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/len pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/srid pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye ba kha na ma tho ba med pa ste/_
[\[102a.3\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rga shi kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma 
[\[102a.4\]]tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[102a.5\]]tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[102a.6\]]yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa

[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[102b.3\]]gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[102b.4\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yang dag 
[\[102b.5\]]par spong ba rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dbang po rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stobs rnams kha na ma tho ba 
[\[102b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[102b.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[103a.2\]]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[103a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[103a.4\]]yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po kha na ma tho ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyon mongs pa med pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral 
[\[107a.2\]]bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[107a.3\]]yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus 
[\[107a.4\]]byas stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/thog 
[\[107a.5\]]ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[107a.6\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa

[\[107b.3\]]bas ma yin no/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams

[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bzhi nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/byams pa chen po nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/snying rje chen po nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma

[\[108a.4\]]bral bas ma yin pa de dag gang yin smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du shes rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par byang ba ste/_

[\[109a.3\]]gzugs rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/

[\[109a.5\]]par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i

[\[109a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chen po stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang

[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]lag brgyad pa rnams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan rnams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang 
[\[110a.2\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshad med pa rnams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang 
[\[110a.3\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas

[\[110a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ltar gang rnam par byang ba de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang zad pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni rnam par byang ba ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no//_//
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bdun pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang chos thams cad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos 
[\[110b.2\]]thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de dag gang yin smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang 
[\[110b.3\]]bral bas ma yin no/_/'du shes 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[110b.4\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce 'jig rten las 'das 
[\[110b.5\]]pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral 
[\[110b.6\]]bas ma yin no/_/sgra 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/dri 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/ro 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral 
[\[110b.7\]]bas ma yin no/_/chos 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 
[\[111a.2\]]'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[111a.3\]]te reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[111a.4\]]reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[111a.5\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[111a.6\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[111a.7\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sa'i khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/chu'i khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma 
[\[111b.2\]]yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma rig pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/'du byed 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[111b.3\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/skye mched drug 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/reg pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshor ba 'jig rten las 
[\[111b.4\]]'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/sred pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/len pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/srid pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[111b.5\]]skye ba 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rga shi 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/
[\[111b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang 
[\[111b.7\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/stong pa

[\[112b\]]

[\[113a\]]

[\[114a.1\]]yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas pa ste/_gang dang yang bral bas

[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/_chos thams cad rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin/_rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs rtag pa ma yin 'jig 
[\[115b.2\]]pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/tshor ba rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/'du shes rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/'du byed 
[\[115b.3\]]rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i

[\[115b.6\]]pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/sgra rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/dri rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/ro rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir

[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa

[\[116a.3\]]yin no/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa rtag pa ma yin 'jig pa ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i rang bzhin ni de yin no/_/rna ba'i 'dus

[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]nam mkha'i khams ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de la mngon par 'du byed pa med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]mngon par zhen par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid la 'dogs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_tshor ba yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_
[\[141b.2\]]'du shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_'du byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rna ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sna yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_lce yang 
[\[141b.3\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_lus yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_yid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sgra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dri yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ro yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_
[\[141b.4\]]reg yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sna'i rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_lce'i rnam par 
[\[141b.5\]]shes pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[141b.6\]]sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang dag

[\[156a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/_de'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma lags te/_de ltar na thams cad shes pa nyid dang ma skyes ba de gnyis su mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig

[\[161a.3\]]grib pa gang lags pa de ni chu'i khams ma lags te/_de ltar na chu'i khams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags

[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/_de'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i 'gri/_ba pa gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das [{]mying [,]ming [}]

[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/_de'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags

[\[170a.7\]]shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang yid kyi rnam par 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 
[\[170b.2\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes 
[\[170b.3\]]bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes 
[\[170b.4\]]bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rna ba'i 
[\[170b.5\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs 
[\[170b.6\]]su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing 
[\[170b.7\]]nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang sa'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang chu'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam ba ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis 
[\[171a.2\]]su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rlung gi khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang nam mkha'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis 
[\[171a.3\]]shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang ma rig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing 
[\[171a.4\]]nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i 
[\[171a.5\]]chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang ming dang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang skye mched drug ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi 
[\[171a.6\]]grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[171a.7\]]gang sred pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang len pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang srid pa zhes bgyi ba 'di 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang skye ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rga shi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa 
[\[171b.2\]]ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis 
[\[171b.3\]]su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes 
[\[171b.4\]]bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang shes rab 
[\[171b.5\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang phyi stong 
[\[171b.6\]]pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang stong pa nyid stong pa 
[\[171b.7\]]nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang don dam pa 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[172a.2\]]gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[172a.3\]]gang thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[172a.4\]]gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 
[\[172a.5\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 
[\[172a.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 
[\[172a.7\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]pa'o/_/gang yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis 
[\[172b.2\]]pa'o/_/gang dbang po rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang stobs rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang byang chub 
[\[172b.3\]]kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[172b.4\]]gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang tshad 
[\[172b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rnam 
[\[172b.6\]]par thar pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/
[\[172b.7\]]gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing 
[\[173a.2\]]nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma 
[\[173a.3\]]mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni 
[\[173a.4\]]gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ces bgyi 
[\[173a.5\]]ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 
[\[173a.6\]]ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/_/gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//_//
[\[173a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bcu gnyis so//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /_yongs su brtag pa ni gang /_de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang 
[\[173b.2\]]ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni/_gang gi phyir sems can/_byang chub yin pa de'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/

[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ma rig pa'i rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes

[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags 
[\[175a.2\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[175a.3\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa med do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dngos po

[\[175a.5\]]pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa med do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/dbang po rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_
