[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon 
[\[175b.2\]]par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rnam 
[\[175b.3\]]pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_
[\[175b.4\]]de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/byams pa chen po'i rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/snying rje chen po'i rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/
[\[175b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/_de la mngon par chags pa med do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa gang dang /_tshul gang dang /_
[\[175b.6\]]mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste/_'di ltar 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sam gzugs sam/_sgra'am dri'am/_ro'am/_reg gam/_phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te/_rnam pa gang dang tshul gang dang /_mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa 
[\[175b.7\]]yod par bya ba/_'di dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]ste/_ci'i phyir ring du song ba zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_phung po rnams las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/khams rnams las ring du song bas na de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/skye mched rnams las ring du 
[\[176a.2\]]song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad las ring du song bas na de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba drug las ring du song bas na/_de'i 
[\[176a.3\]]phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring 
[\[176a.4\]]du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/shes

[\[176a.6\]]nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa 
[\[176a.7\]]nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/mtha' las 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]'das pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/

[\[176b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/

[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las ring du song bas na/_de'i phyir

[\[177a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ring du song ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/_yongs su rtag pa gang zhes zer ba ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_

[\[178a.1\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'du shes dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'du byed rtag ces bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'du byed bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'du byed

[\[178b.7\]]rtog go_/lce rtag ces bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/lce bdag ces bya ba dang bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/lce sdug ces bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce stong zhes bya ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/lce mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/lce smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/

[\[182a\]]

[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben 
[\[182b.2\]]zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[182b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_
[\[182b.4\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben 
[\[182b.5\]]zhes bya ba dang /_mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 
[\[182b.6\]]'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[182b.7\]]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[183a.2\]]reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid 
[\[183a.3\]]kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar 
[\[183a.4\]]yongs su mi rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang /_
[\[183a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog

[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sa'i khams mtshan ma

[\[185a.3\]]zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang /_

[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]rtog go_/me'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi 
[\[185b.2\]]khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams sdug ces bya 
[\[185b.3\]]ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams smon pa yod ces 
[\[185b.4\]]bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rlung gi khams dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang /_mi rtag 
[\[185b.5\]]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang /_
[\[185b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams smon 
[\[185b.7\]]pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/nam mkha'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag 
[\[186a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams mtshan ma yod 
[\[186a.3\]]ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/
[\[186a.4\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/ma rig pa bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/ma rig pa bdag

[\[189a.7\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

[\[195b.1\]]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/byang chub kyi yan

[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_
[\[196a.2\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams rtag 
[\[196a.3\]]ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams 
[\[196a.4\]]sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/bsam

[\[199a\]]

[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[199b.2\]]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang /_ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/snying rje chen po dben zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dben zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rtag ces 
[\[199b.3\]]bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas 
[\[199b.4\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]sdug ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]stong zhes bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_

[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/

[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]ces bya bar yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog go_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba

[\[200b.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_chos 'di dag la/_yongs su rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_de ltar yongs su rtog go/_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu gsum pa/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i 
[\[200b.4\]]phyir/_de skad du/_gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs ma yin/_tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_tshor ba ma yin/_'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_'du shes ma yin/_'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_'du byed ma yin/_rnam par 
[\[200b.5\]]shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin/_rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba ma yin/_sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa 
[\[200b.6\]]de ni/_sna ma yin/_lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lce ma yin/_lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lus ma yin/_yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_yid ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/_gzugs kyi ma skyes pa 
[\[200b.7\]]gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs ma yin/_sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_sgra ma yin/_dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_dri ma yin/_ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_ro ma yin/_reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_reg ma yin/_chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]de ni/_chos ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[201a.2\]]ma yin/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa 
[\[201a.3\]]ma yin/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus 
[\[201a.4\]]te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[201a.5\]]reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[201a.6\]]ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes

[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]yin pa de ni/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/_sa'i khams

[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]pa stong pa nyid ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes 
[\[202b.2\]]pa gang yin pa de ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_de skad du/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/_
[\[202b.3\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/_dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_dbang po 
[\[202b.4\]]rnams ma yin/_stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_stobs rnams ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa

[\[202b.6\]]pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi

[\[203a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ma yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/_byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/_byams pa chen po ma

[\[203a.7\]]skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'du byed ni 'du byed 
[\[203b.2\]]kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/_gang stong pa 
[\[203b.3\]]de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin te/_

[\[207b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam

[\[207b.4\]]kyis stong ste/_gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa

[\[212a\]]

[\[220a.5\]]yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de 
[\[220a.6\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ma yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/_byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen po ma yin/_snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin 
[\[220a.7\]]pa de yang snying rje chen po ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/_thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/_gang 'di gzugs zhes 
[\[220b.2\]]bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su

[\[223a.1\]]cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su

[\[223b\]]

[\[223b.7\]]'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar sgra yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang sgra/_sgra nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar dri yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang dri/_dri nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di dri zhes

[\[224a.5\]]zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_

[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa yang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa/_sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/_/'di ltar

[\[228a\]]

[\[228a.5\]]ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/_gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i

[\[228b\]]

[\[228b.4\]]pa'o/_/'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/_ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/_ma skyes pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam

[\[234b.1\]]'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/_ngo bo nyid

[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang skye ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang skye ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_dbang po rnams kyang skye ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_stobs rnams kyang skye ba med/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang skye ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]kyang skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]na ni/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams

[\[238b.3\]]dpa' chen pos kyang /_byang chub rnam pa lnga thob zin par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te/_chos thams cad ma skyes pa yin na/_ci'i phyir na/_rgyun tu zhugs pas ni/_kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/_lan cig

[\[238b.6\]]cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/_ci'i phyir na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_ci'i phyir na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/_de skad ces

[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]tu zhugs pa yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/_/ma skyes pa la phyir mi

[\[240a.1\]]don dam par ni las kyang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_las kyi rnam par smin pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_skye ba yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_'gag pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_rnam par byang ba yang [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye

[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sgra ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni yid

[\[241a.4\]]dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/
[\[241a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[241a.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni chu'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni me'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rlung gi khams 
[\[241a.7\]]ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni nam mkha'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma skyes pa rang bzhin 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni ma rig pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'du byed ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[241b.2\]]dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni skye mched drug ma 
[\[241b.3\]]skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni reg pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni tshor ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/
[\[241b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sred pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni len pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni srid pa 
[\[241b.5\]]ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni skye ba ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rga shi ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/
[\[241b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[241b.7\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang 
[\[242a.2\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni phyi 
[\[242a.3\]]nang stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang 
[\[242a.4\]]bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod 
[\[242a.5\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang 
[\[242a.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[242a.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dngos po 
[\[242b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[242b.3\]]pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni yang dag par spong ba 
[\[242b.4\]]rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dbang po rnams ma skyes pa 
[\[242b.5\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni stobs rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin 
[\[242b.6\]]gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma skyes pa 
[\[242b.7\]]rang bzhin kyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni bsam gtan rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni tshad med pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma skyes pa 
[\[243a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[243a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[243a.4\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_

[\[243a.7\]]ni snying rje chen po ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rgyun 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 
[\[243b.2\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rang byang chub ma skyes pa 
[\[243b.3\]]rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma skyes pa rang

[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lus skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni yid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni gzugs

[\[244b.1\]]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang

[\[244b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sa'i khams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/

[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni ma rig pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod 
[\[245a.2\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[245a.3\]]bu/_bdag ni skye mched drug skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis 
[\[245a.4\]]stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sred pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni len pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[245a.5\]]ti'i bu/_bdag ni srid pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni skye ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rga shi skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[245a.6\]]pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye 
[\[245a.7\]]bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 
[\[245b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni nang stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[245b.3\]]bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[245b.4\]]skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis 
[\[245b.5\]]stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 
[\[245b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod 
[\[245b.7\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[246a.5\]]dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag

[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos thams cad la gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[249a.2\]]dag gi chos nyid de de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos tha_mas cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa yin/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_

[\[249a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni 
[\[249a.7\]]nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[249b.2\]]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs 
[\[249b.3\]]ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sgra ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med 
[\[249b.4\]]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni 
[\[249b.5\]]nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_reg ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang 
[\[249b.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka med par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang 
[\[249b.7\]]na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
