[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dbang po rnams ni rang 
[\[253a.2\]]bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[253a.3\]]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i 
[\[253a.4\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[253a.5\]]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/tshe dang 
[\[253a.6\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshad med pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin 
[\[253a.7\]]gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[253b.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[253b.3\]]mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na 
[\[253b.4\]]yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[253b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams ni rang 
[\[253b.6\]]bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[253b.7\]]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byams pa chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_snying 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa 
[\[254a.2\]]ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[254a.3\]]yang mi dmigs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 
[\[254a.4\]]'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 
[\[254a.5\]]gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang mi gnas phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_lam gyi rnam pa 
[\[254a.6\]]shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas phyi rol na yang mi gnas gnyis ka [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/_de ni nang na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas 
[\[254a.7\]]phyi rol na yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas gnyis ka med par yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa'o//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bam po bcu bdun pa/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas de ltar na/_gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'du shes 
[\[254b.2\]]yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rna ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sna yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lce yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lus yongs su sbyang 
[\[254b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/yid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sgra yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dri yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/ro yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/reg yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/chos yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam 
[\[254b.4\]]par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/yid 
[\[254b.5\]]kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lus kyi 
[\[254b.6\]]'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[254b.7\]]rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sa'i 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/chu'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/me'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rlung gi khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/nam mkha'i khams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[255a.2\]]yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/ma rig pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'du byed yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/skye mched drug yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/reg pa yongs su sbyang 
[\[255a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/tshor ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sred pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/len pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/srid pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/skye ba yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rga shi yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[255a.4\]]pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang 
[\[255a.5\]]bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/phyi stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar 
[\[255a.6\]]bya'o/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[255a.7\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rang gi mtshan 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar 
[\[255b.2\]]bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dbang po rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/stobs rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/
[\[255b.3\]]byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/bsam gtan rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yongs su sbyang 
[\[255b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[255b.5\]]mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs 
[\[255b.6\]]su sbyang bar bya'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/byams pa chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/snying rje chen po yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 
[\[255b.7\]]yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/_byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[256a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa 
[\[256a.3\]]yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod/_shes 
[\[256a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod do/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /_'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang /_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[256a.5\]]ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sbyin pa byed cing sbyin bdag tu gyur pa dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_phongs pa dang /_ltogs pa dang /_'dron pa dang /_slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa la ni skom/_theg pa 
[\[256a.6\]]'dod pa la ni theg pa/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos/_me tog 'dod pa la ni me tog_/phreng ba 'dod pa la ni phreng ba/_spos 'dod pa la ni spos/_byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/_gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/_mal stan 'dod pa la ni mal stan/_yo byad 'dod pa la 
[\[256a.7\]]ni yo byad/_sman 'dod pa la ni sman/_yongs su gtong ba nas/_mi'i yo byad gzhan ci yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/_bu pho 'dod pa la ni bu pho yongs su gtong /_bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo yongs su gtong /_chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma yongs su gtong /_
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]rgyal srid 'dod pa la ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong /_mgo 'dod pa la ni mgo yongs su gtong /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'dod pa la ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su gtong /_yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa la ni yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong /_sha dang khrag dang rkang 'dod 
[\[256b.2\]]pa la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang yongs su gtong ste/_de yang gnas shing yongs su gtong la/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong ba'o/_/'di ni len pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'o/_/bdag ni ser sna med pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin pa'i bdag po'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[256b.3\]]bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes te/_sbyin pa de byin nas kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_
[\[256b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis/_sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang /_nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_de chags pa gsum la chags 
[\[256b.5\]]shing /_sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_sbyin par 'du shes pa 'di gsum la chags nas/_sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[256b.6\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir na/_'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir/_'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i 
[\[256b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]len pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sbyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar mi byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan 
[\[257a.2\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la gtong ste/_sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo zhing /_mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag 
[\[257a.3\]]par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/_/de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo 
[\[257a.4\]]zhing 'phag la/_'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/_de la 'jig rten 
[\[257a.5\]]pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung zhing de yang gnas pas srung ste/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du/_tshul khrims 
[\[257a.6\]]srung ngo /_/'di ni tshul khrims so/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do zhes de ltar tshul khrims srung zhing [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_
[\[257a.7\]]bdag gi tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu 'dis/_sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]tshul khrims su 'du shes pa dang /_chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing tshul khrims srung ste/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir na/_'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/_de ni 
[\[257b.2\]]'di ltar 'jig rten las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir/_'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa 
[\[257b.3\]]gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_tshul khrims [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_
[\[257b.4\]]tshul khrims de yang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/_sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[257b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir/_'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_
[\[257b.6\]]'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/_de la 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa sgom zhing /_de yang gnas pas sgom ste/_de 'di 
[\[257b.7\]]snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa sgom mo/_/'di ni bzod pa'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed ces te/_bzod pa de [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_bdag gi bzod pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang /_nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang 
[\[258a.2\]]gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_bzod par 'du shes pa dang /_chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing bzod pa sgom mo/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes 
[\[258a.3\]]bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[258a.4\]]bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bzod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_bzod pa de sems can thams cad la gtong zhing /_sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[258a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_mtshan ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa 
[\[258a.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/_de la 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la 
[\[258a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom zhing /_de la yang gnas pas rtsom ste/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di ni lus so/_/'di ni sems so/_/'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/bdag ni 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du byed do/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes te/_brtson 'grus de yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_
[\[258b.2\]]bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang /_nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_brtson 
[\[258b.3\]]'grus su 'du shes pa dang /_chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[258b.4\]]de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[258b.5\]]chen po/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_brtson 'grus de yang sems can thams cad la gtong zhing /_sems can de dag kyang 
[\[258b.6\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_mtshan ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ba 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 
[\[258b.7\]]'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/_de la 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing /_de yang gnas pas snyoms par 'jug ste/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad 
[\[259a.2\]]kyi don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/_/'di ni bsam gtan no/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do zhes te/_bsam gtan de la snyoms par 'jug pa de yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/_bla na med 
[\[259a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_bdag gi bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang nye bar len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes 
[\[259a.4\]]pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_bsam gtan du 'du shes pa dang /_chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las 
[\[259a.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[259a.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_bsam gtan [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par smin pa la yang dga' bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_bsam gtan 
[\[259a.7\]]de yang sems can thams cad la gtong zhing sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_mtshan ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang 
[\[259b.2\]]yod de/_de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab sgom zhing de yang gnas pas sgom ste/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[259b.3\]]tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad 'chags shing bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab ba byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang thabs ma yin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[259b.4\]]chub tu sngo zhing /_de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab sgom mo/_/'di ni shes rab bo/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do zhes te/_shes rab sgom pa de yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun 
[\[259b.5\]]mong du byas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_bdag gi shes rab kyi 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang /_nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo ste/_
[\[259b.6\]]de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_gzhan du 'du shes pa dang /_shes rab tu 'du shes pa dang /_chags pa 'di gsum la chags shing /_shes rab sgom pa 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las 
[\[259b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phag [{]myi [,]mi [}]'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/_/de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/_de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]ti'i bu/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab sgom pa'i tshe/_bdag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_shes rab [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_rnam par smin pa la yang dga' par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed de/_shes rab de yang 
[\[260a.2\]]sems can thams cad la gtong zhing /_sems can de dag kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngo zhing /_mtshan ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[260a.3\]]phyin pa zhes bya ste/_de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phag la 'da' bas de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha 
[\[260a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /_byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[260a.5\]]phyin pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[260a.6\]]chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/shes 
[\[260a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[260b.2\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam 
[\[260b.3\]]mo/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub 
[\[260b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/
[\[260b.5\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/dngos po med 
[\[260b.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/
[\[261a.2\]]stobs lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[261a.3\]]dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/bsam gtan bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_
[\[261a.4\]]tshad med pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[261a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa ni/_
[\[261a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/mngon par shes pa lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/
[\[261a.7\]]gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/snying 
[\[261b.2\]]rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/
[\[261b.3\]]de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi mthu yin/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang 
[\[261b.4\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub 
[\[261b.5\]]sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su sdud cing yang dag par sdud pa'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_
[\[261b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_
[\[261b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyod cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyod de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa 
[\[262a.2\]]ti'i bu/_gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur ram/_rmongs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar sems 
[\[262a.3\]]can thams cad bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i phyir/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa 'dis/_rnam par spyod par shes par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[262a.4\]]snying rje chen po yid la bya ba'i yid la bya ba de dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/_/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par spyod pa 'dis rnam par spyod cing 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la bya ba'i yid la bya ba de dang ma bral bas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[262a.5\]]sems dpa' chen por 'dod na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na ni/_sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems can thams cad kyang yid la bya ba dang ni ma bral lo/_/rab 'byor 
[\[262a.6\]]kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_legs so legs so/_/dri'o dri'o snyam pa'i don de nyid/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[262a.7\]]sems can [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/sems can dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/sems can rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/

[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ba'i phyir/_yid la byed pa mngon 
[\[265b.2\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya bar rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o/_/

[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]phyir/_yid la byed pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/

[\[273b\]]

[\[277a.3\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ba'i phyir/_yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya bar rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang

[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa rang bzhin [{]myed [,]med [}]par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub stong pa nyid 
[\[281a.2\]]kyi phyir/_yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub dben pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya ba'i phyir/_yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgya bar rig par bya'o/_/
[\[281a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la byed pa nyid dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so 
[\[281a.4\]]zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rab 'byor legs so legs so/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/_rab 'byor khyod ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[281a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /_ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis smras pa'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[281a.6\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos so/_rab tu g.yos so/_kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to rab tu 'gul to/_kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go_/rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu 
[\[281a.7\]]chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig_/kun tu shig shig go_/shar phyogs dma' bar gyur na/_nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs mtho bar gyur na/_nub phyogs dma' bar gyur to/_/
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]byang phyogs dma' bar gyur na/_lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs mtho bar gyur na/_lho phyogs dma' bar gyur to/_/dbus dma' bar gyur na/_mtha' mtho bar gyur to/_/mtha' dma' bar gyur na/_dbus mtho bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[281b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/_'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_
[\[281b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin 
[\[281b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_
[\[281b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[281b.6\]]nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[281b.7\]]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_
[\[282a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_byang shar kyi phyogs 
[\[282a.3\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs med pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 
[\[282a.4\]]ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[282a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[282a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs med pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[282a.7\]]phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor 
[\[282b.2\]]ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[282b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad do/_/rab 'byor ji ltar nga 'jig rten gyi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 'di na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig 
[\[282b.4\]]rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na 'ang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ston pa mdzad 
[\[282b.5\]]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]skye dgu khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_shes 
[\[282b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_yang sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_rab 
[\[282b.7\]]'byor kyi le'u ste/_bcu gsum mo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu dgu pa/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal po chen po ji snyed yod pa de dag 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba 
[\[283a.2\]]khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rab mtshe ma'i lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /_lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus 
[\[283a.3\]]par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[283a.4\]]khams na/_'phrul dga'i lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i 
[\[283a.5\]]bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_
[\[283a.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_
[\[283a.7\]]dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor 
[\[283b.2\]]de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_mtshe ma'i 
[\[283b.3\]]lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus 
[\[283b.4\]]kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_kun snang dang ba'i 
[\[283b.5\]]lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 
[\[283b.6\]]'od gang yin pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song /_stong gi char yang nye bar ma song /_brgya stong gi 
[\[283b.7\]]char yang nye bar ma song /_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang ma bzod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi drung na/_lha'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]de dag thams cad lha ma me ma yin/_lhan ne ma yin/_lhang nge ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'ba' shig de dag gi nang na dam par snang ngo /_gtso bor snang ngo /_/gya nom par snang ngo /_/'phags 
[\[284a.2\]]par snang ngo /_/mchog tu snang ngo /_/rab tu snang ngo /_/phul du snang ngo /_/bla na med par snang ngo /_/gong na med par snang ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[284a.3\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_
[\[284a.4\]]dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa gtan la bab par bstan pa thos par 'dod nas/_chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/_
[\[284a.5\]]ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab 
[\[284a.6\]]par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[284a.7\]]gyi rlabs kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar bslab par bya ba 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]dang /_lha'i bu gang gis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed ba de dag gis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed bar bya ba bstan par bya'o/_/gang yang dag pa skyon med par zhugs par gyur 
[\[284b.2\]]pa de dag ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyud kyi sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir te/_'on kyang gal te de dag bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[284b.3\]]sems bskyed na de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur bas/_de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs la bdag ni bar chad [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/kau shi ka de la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_gzugs ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag 
[\[284b.5\]]par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni nang du yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/
[\[284b.6\]]gzugs ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni 'jig 
[\[284b.7\]]par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni 'go ba'i nang du yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni bdag gi med par yid la bya'o/_/gzugs ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/gzugs 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_tshor ba ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[285a.2\]]par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni nang du yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni na bar yid 
[\[285a.3\]]la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni mi brtan par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/
[\[285a.4\]]tshor ba ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o/_/tshor ba ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[285a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_'du shes ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes 
[\[285a.6\]]ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la 
[\[285a.7\]]bya'o/_/'du shes ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]par yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o/_/'du shes ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_'du byed ni mi rtag par yid la 
[\[285b.2\]]bya'o/_/'du byed ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni bdag med par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/'du 
[\[285b.3\]]byed ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni 
[\[285b.4\]]'jig par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/'du byed ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/
[\[285b.5\]]'du byed ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam par shes pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes 
[\[285b.6\]]pa ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/rnam 
[\[285b.7\]]par shes pa ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]'jig par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni bdag gi med par yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni 
[\[286a.2\]]yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/
[\[286a.3\]{]myig [,]mig [}]ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 
[\[286a.4\]]dgrar yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni 
[\[286a.5\]]bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/mig ni yid brtan du mi rung bar yid la bya'o/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rna ba ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni 
[\[286a.6\]]sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni bdag med par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba 
[\[286a.7\]]ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni mi brtan par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni stong pa nyid 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]du yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/rna ba ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sna ni mi rtag par 
[\[286b.2\]]yid la bya'o/_/sna ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni bdag med par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni nang du yid la bya'o/_/sna ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/sna ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/
[\[286b.3\]]sna ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/sna ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/sna ni stong pa nyid du 
[\[286b.4\]]yid la bya'o/_/sna ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/sna ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/sna ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_lce ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa par yid la 
[\[286b.5\]]bya'o/_/lce ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/lce ni shu bar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/lce ni sdig par yid 
[\[286b.6\]]la bya'o/_/lce ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/lce ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/lce 
[\[286b.7\]]ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/lce ni bdag gi med par yid la bya'o/_/lce ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/lce ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_lus ni 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni sdug bsngal bar yid la bya'o/_/lus ni bdag med par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni zhi bar yid la bya'o/_/lus ni dben par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni nad du yid la bya'o/_/lus ni shu bar yid la 
[\[287a.2\]]bya'o/_/lus ni zug rngur yid la bya'o/_/lus ni sdig par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni na bar yid la bya'o/_/lus ni dgrar yid la bya'o/_/lus ni 'jig pa'i chos can du yid la bya'o/_/lus ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]brtan par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni 'jig par yid la bya'o/_/
[\[287a.3\]]lus ni 'jigs par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni 'go ba'i nad du yid la bya'o/_/lus ni stong pa nyid du yid la bya'o/_/lus ni bdag gi [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid la bya'o/_/lus ni yid brtan du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung bar yid la bya'o/_/lus ni gnod par yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa
